queries.query_text: Summarize MYSTIC

top_results.preview: You're a conduit, channeling the fundamental forces that connect and bind everything in the cosmos.  You can draw upon this supernatural wellspring to form deep spiritual bonds with your allies,  empo
Assume you view the universe through the lens of your connection.
You're connected to the fount of vitality and void energy that  flows through all living things on every planet. You weave these  energies into spells that heal your allies and harm your enemies.
You see into the truth of the cosmos through your connection. You gain the greater epiphany spell for your chosen connection.
You discover the ultimate truth of your connection and its  role as a foundation of the cosmos. You learn your chosen  connection's perfect harmony.
Have insights into the nature of your connection that others find unorthodox.

Through dedication or serendipity, you've branched out to  explore other connections to the fundamental building blocks of  the cosmos. You learn the initial epiphany spell of a connection  that grant
Plumbing the depths of your own connection, you  understand how your piece of reality interconnects  with another. You learn the advanced epiphany spell of  the connection that grants training in the

All mystics have a supernatural connection with a cosmic force  that grants magical powers. The exact nature of your connection  can vary widely—you might worship a god or pantheon, embody  a metaphys
Think of you as the heart of your party.

queries.query_text: What is the rule about CLASS FEATURES?

top_results.preview: You gain these abilities as a mystic. Abilities gained at higher levels list the level at  which you gain them next to the features' names.
At 2nd level and every even-numbered level, you gain a mystic  class feat. These begin on page 121.
At every level that you gain a mystic feat, you can select one  of the following feats. You must satisfy any prerequisites  before selecting the feat.
As you increase in level as a mystic, your number of spells  per day increases, as does the highest rank of spells you can  cast, as shown on the Mystic Spells per Day table on page 119.

At 3rd level and every 4 levels thereafter, you gain a general  feat. General feats are listed in Chapter 5.
